resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/102903</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>102903</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202518</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Control Game</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Steuerspiel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Jeu de Commande</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Jogo Do Controle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il Gioco Di Controllo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το παιχνίδι ελέγχου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Juego Del Control</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The control game is an experiential, hands on opportunity for students to explore their ideas about personal control and influence in their own lives and their control and influence in the lives of others.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Steuerspiel ist- ein erfahrungsmäßiges, 
Hände auf Gelegenheit, damit Kursteilnehmer ihre Ideen über 
persönliche Steuerung und Einfluß in ihren Selbst lebt und ihre 
Steuerung und Einfluß in den Lebensdauern von anderen erforschen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le jeu de commande est un empirique, les mains sur
l'occasion pour que les étudiants explorent leurs idées au sujet de 
commande personnelle et influence dans leurs propres vit et leur 
commande et influence dans les vies de d'autres.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O jogo do controle é um experiential, as mãos na
oportunidade para que os estudantes explorem suas idéias sobre o 
controle pessoal e influência no seus próprios vivem e seus controle
e influência nas vidas de outras.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il gioco di controllo è un empirico, le mani 
sull'occasione affinchè gli allievi esplorino le loro idee circa 
controllo personale ed influenza nei loro propri vive ed il loro 
controllo ed influenza nelle durate di altre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το παιχνίδι ελέγχου είναι ένα εμπειρικό, χέρια στην 
ευκαιρία για τους σπουδαστές να ερευνήσουν τις ιδέες τους για τον 
προσωπικούς έλεγχο και την επιρροή στις ζωές τους και ο έλεγχός 
τους και την επιρροή στις ζωές άλλες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El juego del control es un experimental, las manos
en la oportunidad para que los estudiantes exploren sus ideas sobre 
control personal e influencia en sus el propios viven y su control e 
influencia en las vidas de otras.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:WENDY LOGAN
FN:WENDY LOGAN
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202518</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>102903</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/the-control-game</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
